name: Who made this art? Human or AI
name_original: Who made this art? Human or AI
description:
Dive into 'Who made this art? Human or AI' – a 2D trivia game where you identify the creator of each masterpiece. Is it a human touch or the brilliance of artificial intelligence? Decide solo or involve your Twitch chat. Unravel the mystery behind each piece – who's the true artist?

Features


  • +1000 different artworks
  • Play it live with your Twitch community via chat
  • Beat your scores as an art detective
